response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This item holds significant value to us, but we understand its worth to you is at $8,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it for $12,000. This price reflects a thoughtful balance between our valuation and your perceived worth, aiming to create a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations or if you would like to discuss further terms. Looking forward to your response.", "product_price": 12000}
